thread.title: Ghanaian midfielder Albert Bruce continues fine form for Valletta in derby win over Floriana in Maltese top-flight
thread.title_full: Ghanaian midfielder Albert Bruce continues fine form for Valletta in derby win over Floriana in Maltese top-flight

title: Ghanaian midfielder Albert Bruce continues fine form for Valletta in derby win over Floriana in Maltese top-flight
text:
14:25 CET Ghanaian midfielder Albert Bruce continues fine form for Valletta in derby win over Floriana in Maltese top-flight - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
The Ghanaian replaced Romeu Romao and delivered another fabulous performance for the Citizens. 
All the action happened in the first half as Valletta raced into a two-goal lead only for Floriana to produce a bold reaction after Mario Fontanella reduced the deficit. 
The Greens’ hopes rose when they awarded a penalty but when Matteo Piciollo’s drive was saved by Henry Bonello, the Valletta goalkeeper, their prospects of ending their long wait for a win over their rivals receded as Valletta struck again before half-time to all but seal the three points to reclaim second place behind leaders Balzan. 
Bruce, a former Kotoko enforcer, has been impressive in the Maltese league since joining as free agent in August this year. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
